strTooltip: Closes the door. Warning: atmospheric conditions may vary significantly on the other side!
Closes the door, restarting auto-close if it was previously overridden. Warning: atmospheric conditions may vary significantly on the other side!
Opens the door. Warning: atmospheric conditions may vary significantly on the other side!
Opens the door, temporarily overriding auto-close until manually closed. Warning: atmospheric conditions may vary significantly on the other side!

strDesc: [us] grants service dock access via ship comms hereafter.

strTooltip: Closes [them] to prevent free exchange of gas and pressure between compartments.
Opens [them] to allow free exchange of gas and pressure between compartments.
